JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Searching for a productionworker for dayshift near Jels
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you a real woodworker, and do you prefer to work in a workshop, then maybe you are the employee we are seeking!

Your job primarily consists on reparing pallets. To do that, you are in charge of assembling the parts, and edit the pallets. When you are done reparing, you will move the pallets outside ind a bundle. 

Everything is done manually with a Hammer and a nailgun. 

 

Professional skills:

  • Knowledge of the tools, they are using.
  • Experience as a woodworker is a advantage, but not a requiment.
  • Speak and understand English

 

Personal skills

  • Be able to do physical work
  • Reliable

 

The salary is dependent on the applicable agreement

 

If interested, please send me a CV or an application at dfi@jobteam.dk
